English: Heliport
Next day, port
Reinforcements are finally here. It's going to take a while for the army to regroup though.
Still the most beautiful sight I have seen in a while. Almost brings tears to my eyes.
What's it like leading, anyway? The uniform suits you at the very least.
It feels right somehow. Like this is what I am supposed to do.
With a father like yours I am not surprised. Comrade Lemontov couldn't have picked a better man for the job.
Thanks, Vadim. It actually means a lot to me. I just wish I could share this moment with my father.\nI hope he would be proud...
Hey, comrades! Other squads are leaving, shouldn't you get to it too?
We are going, don't worry!
Comrades! The enemy knows about our reinforcements and plans to make one last major offensive to break us before we regroup!
We are assigned to the central front. Our job is to make sure not a single American boot gets to the northern part of the island.
I am not one for grand speeches, just let me tell you this - give it your best, comrades.
Follow my lead, cover each other's back and stay sharp and focused. Let's fight like a unit so we can win as an army!
Check your gear and get ready, comrades. It is time to turn the tide in this war!
Get to the chopper, comrades!
GOOD LUCK, LEONID!
LEONID TO UNITS ON THE CENTRAL FRONT, WE'RE HERE. REPORT STATUS. OVER.
IVAN TO LEONID. FULL STRENGTH INFANTRY SQUAD WAITING FOR YOUR ORDERS. OVER.
KONSTANTIN TO LEONID, WE'RE UNDERSTAFFED ANTI-TANK TEAM. OVER.
YELENA TO LEONID, WE ARE VERY LOW ON NUMBERS BUT WE DO HAVE ONE BMP TO SUPPORT US. OVER.

RIGHT, EVERYONE, LISTEN UP. IVAN, WATCH THE BACK OF THE BASE. THE REST ARE GOING TO THE FRONT. KONSTANTIN YOU TAKE THE RIGHT FLANK, YELENA THE LEFT. WE'LL BE IN THE CENTER. STAY LOW AND DEFENSIVE, WE'LL BE HEAVILY OUTNUMBERED. HOPEFULLY ANY TANKS SHOULD RUN AFOUL OF THE MINEFIELD, WE DON'T EXPECT TOO MUCH BESIDES APCS. GET READY, COMRADES. OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, YOU SHOULD KNOW THAT THE ATTACK ON BOTH OUR COASTAL FRONTS HAS STARTED. EXPECT THE ENEMY ANY MOMENT NOW. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID. THE ENEMY IS SENDING IN PARATROOPERS. WATCH YOUR BACK AND FLANKS. BAZA OUT.
LEONID TO BAZA, CENTRAL FRONT IS HOLDING AND THE ENEMY IS RETREATING. ANY NEW ORDERS? OVER.
BAZA TO LEONID, THE ENEMY HAS BROKEN THROUGH IN THE EAST. HE'S ADVANCING FAST TO OUR BASE AND WILL SOON THREATEN OUR UNITS WITH ENCIRCLEMENT. MOVE TO THE EAST AND SUPPORT OUR UNITS. BAZA OUT.
LEONID TO OTHERS. WATCH THE BASE IN CASE OF SOME MORE SURPRISES FROM THE ENEMY. I'M TAKING LEONID TO SUPPORT THE EASTERN FRONT. OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, WE ARE PREPARING LIGHT TANKS TO ADVANCE FROM THE COAST ALONG THE ROAD TO THE BASE. IT WILL TAKE SOME TIME, HOLD UNTIL THEY CAN GET TO YOU. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, THE ENEMY HAS BEEN REPELLED. WELL DONE, COMRADES. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, THE ENEMY BROKE THROUGH THE CENTRAL FRONT. WHERE THE HELL HAVE YOU BEEN? GET BACK TO BASE SO THAT THE FIRING SQUAD CAN SHOOT YOU. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, THE ENEMY BROKE THROUGH THE EASTERN FRONT. WE'LL HAVE TO RETREAT FURTHER NORTH. YOU COULDN'T HAVE TRIED A LITTLE HARDER? BAZA OUT.
Central Front
Eastern Front
Western Front
Board Chopper
Minefield
Support Eastern Front
HOLD CENTRAL FRONT
STOP THE ENEMY BREAKTHROUGH
